Blog.post: wEll. i tot today would be a nice dae. but.. dat stupid peijun had to spoil my good day. i woke up so early to come to skool and enjoy a basketball match with klass.tHe game was so hell fun! :) :) i scored the first one!! and almost scored a three pointer!!!!!! the ball hit the rim... was about to go in... but the rebounce too hard den bounce off!!! crap! haha. during recess i had just found out amanda was leaving!!!! not so bad la. shes gonna cum bak!! but in december. she will be goin there for ice skating championships!! PRO WORX!! i shall wish her good luck!! and come bak with a prize okies? after recess dat bitchy jun go tell tan i ask shanx not to tok to her. wat crap? is shanx also dowan tok to her..SIAOZER! and she betray me frist. ppl forgif her liaos... when i tok to her NICELY!! she shout at me ok! hu in da rong? all the gals on my side now kies! she tink dat div and shak fren her. *pui* dey hate her.. hahahhahahhahas man. those ppl are my real good frenx. lurf dem 4eva! freak tan scolded me lorx! hu she tink she is? cum interfere in my friendship "life"! bitch. she made me make frenx with dat fukker jun and she made me pollute my hand by shakin hands with her.. *pui*!! ive got polluted hands... eeks!!!!!!!!!!!!! well i haf washed dem many times liaos. haha after i cry... after lunch... after goin to da toilet... haha!!! thier not polluted ANYMORE!!!!!!!hahahhahahahahha! after skool shak came to moi house! :) she helped me get over dat bitch! haha. such a nice fren horx?? dam nice. wun forget her all my life!! after shak left... stupid xun look down on ppl again. cant stand him animore. whole dae look down on ppl. hate him! just like gw! all the same!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *pissed*

bLeAhx~ tOday art gotta sketch palm tree. at first i was lyk.. shit la. ask me sketch palm tree? i suk at art. and u wan me sketch this palm tree? sure cannot de. in the end. i realized dat after all my sketching nOt bad larhx. it turned out quite okie la... but as usual... stef and divya one is da best!! hahas. teo go scold ria today... say wat... no more trainin for u until PSLE over. cuz he tot her mum dun allow. but her mum allow. she din tell teo so lyk datz mah. when i went to gym i saw amanda der. and teo din scold me for going in. i told ria and she got damn pissed with teo. haix. she tinks dat teo only lyk me and amanda... so let us go gym. dunno liao lahs. teo is not those type hu anihow scold ppl mah. and he is not pian xin dex... lOl... tOday ms tan gaf whole klass 20 cents each. haha! fer wat? cuz we wait for her in klass for 1/2 and hr. tink she too rich bahx. alwaes anihow gib us money de. on second dae of skool. she lyk arrange our seats liaos.den she say those hu are in the group she arranged. get 1 buck from her. siaos hor? den lyk 5 ppl got it. she my as well gib money to charity? aniwae. gib us also can. hahas!!!! gtg do work!! *muackies*

hEllOs~! had tution just now!! haha. chinese... quitE bOriNg. hEll!! my stupid fatty bro gone case. i tryin do homework den? he cum irritate me lyk siaos. canot concentrate! stupid... den irritate me not enuff. go irritate moi sis. my sis so pissed den throw his toy! haha! serve him rite. he cried lyk a gay fag lor! lOlx. super funny! :) for revenge. he throw my bag. cuz he tinks its mine. as my bag and my sis one ALMOST the same! hahaha. such a loser. he wanted to hit my head with a plastic thingy lor! lucky i ducked down!! =P but it hit moi sis leg den broke. a chip hit her leg a scratched her. the blood waz lyk gushing out? DISGUSTING!! haha. dunno why i so unlucky to haf a brother lyk him. hate him sia. whole day irritate me de. and his lyk sOooOoOOoOooOoOOoOoOO freakin fat? 36 kg... and his lyk only p3? i p3 i tink 27 kg only.. i'd rather him in aussie and my elder bro here! okie. shall stop. needa get bak to my work b4 da fatty irritates me. *muackies*

hElL. oral was soo crappy.used lotsa past tense. sure fail. haiz. haha. hope not sia. lol. today went to stef house wif zoey... at first mum dun allow de cuz we wanted to swim but i sick so canot lorh! den i was lyk beggin her. den later she go tell me dad. my dad at first din wanna let me go but he said if i go canot swim and stuff. so i just went and din swim. but still had a real great time... we were lyk playin Big 2 wif stef's cute and tiny cards. haha so farny. den i started to do my work so zoey and stef plae speed... dey plae until soo happy den i decieded to join dem... wahas! ZoEy suppose leave at 2 but in de end left at 2+ haha. hope her mum doesnt scold her...lOl this week go stef's house twice liao. on wed and today!!! haha! wednesday swim until suntan and catchin a flu rite now!! haha. so today canot swim lo. k lahz i stop here!! needa study!! *muackies*

This is my first time creatin a blog. so dat means... i am a newbie! haha. lEtS see. today i started playin bball again...sooooo long neva play liao le. Cuz i concentratin on gym den now no more gym i go bak to bball!! haha but kena by ball on e face. dat johannes la. neva see anyhow throw ball. somemore my face! lucky my nose never bleed arh. if not i come after u! haha! crap. i dunno wat to sae liao. me newbie. okie i shall stop hErE! hEe! lURf yA~!mUACKs~!
